page.title: 20SNAITH COMMUNITY LIFE .3.
page.content:
The only organised social events are those originated by the Parent's Associations of the two schools. The Comprehensive swells its funds by playing Whist and the Primary by consuming Home Brew. SENIOR CITIZENS Many of the town's Senior Citizens live on a 'sheltered' estate next to the Primary School and the Play Area. There is a day centre operated by the residents themselves with the help of a warden.
It would seem that the residents like Snaith the way it is. There is no difficulty in selling property, and more significantly in 1985 no serious vandalism.
